column3: Traffic;Sihanoukville: A container truck overturned on National Road 4
column7: Sihanoukville at 6:30 pm May 2020.------According to authorities
column8: the truck was driving in the direction of Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh
column9: and  there were no serious injuries.------After the incident
column10: local police officers intervened to ease congested traffic and handle the procedure. ------NKD
